column1: The United Kingdom also includes the Channel Islands and the Isle of Man.

The number of NZ travellers overseas is estimated from a sample of records, using day of departure and intended length of absence. It is calculated for each day within the selected period and averaged.

These estimates are not the number of New Zealand travellers in a country. The main destination is the country a person will spend the most time in while away. A person may also spend time in other countries, as well as time travelling between countries.
